Rewards Rate: 20% Scapia Coins on Travel Bookings (~4%) & 10% Scapia Coins on All Other Transactions (~2%)
Reward Redemption: Redeem Coins on Scapia. 1 Scapia Coin = ₹0.20
Domestic Lounge Access: Unlimited on Making Spends of ₹10,000 for Visa Variant and ₹15,000 for RuPay Variant

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Fuel Surcharge Waiver on Transactions Upto ₹5,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Total Amount Withdrawn or a Minimum of Rs. 500

product_details: Earn 20% Scapia Coins while making bookings on Scapia.
Earn 10% Scapia Coins on all offline and online transactions (with few exceptions like fuel, wallet reloads, etc).
